text: فَأُلْقِىَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدًا قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَـٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ

translation.en.sahih: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."
translation.id.indonesian: Lalu tukang-tukang sihir itu tersungkur dengan bersujud, seraya berkata: "Kami telah percaya kepada Tuhan Harun dan Musa".
